name: 魔物讨伐团
description: 卡牌与RPG结合的无尽地牢探险之旅！最早融合Roguelike与卡牌的游戏之一。多达14种职业，真人配音+纸娃娃系统，完善的卡牌设计，各类魔物与随机事件等你体验！
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Processor 2 GHz (Dual Core) Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible 3D graphics card with 256 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
